Title: Sixty years of the great Chinese Communist Party 1921-1981
Notes: Part of a series marking the 60th anniversary of the CCP. Subtitled "Realize the shift of focus and build a powerful country with Four Modernizations" (实现重点转移建设四化强国), this first part (of four) covers "The party and the nation have entered a new period of historical development 1976-1981" (党和国家进入新的历史发展时期 1976-1981).It shows anti-Gang of Four criticism meetings; the adoption of the Four Modernizations blueprint (December 1978); and the rehibilitation of Liu Shaoqi.
Theme: The Founding of the Chinese Communist Party (1921)Gang of Four (四人帮)Liu Shaoqi
